name: Whamon
description: Whamon is an Aquatic Mammal Digimon. It lives in the deep oceans of the Net , and has a large build. Its enormity is of the highest class in the Digital World, and due to that enormity, it carries a volume of data that couldn't be processed by a normal computer. Although it has been possible to confirm it as the same species as those in File Island 's coastal waters, this Whamon, which lives off of Folder Continent 's coast, and whose appearance is totally the same, has surpassed the previous in both offensive ability and vitality, and accomplished a digivolution to Ultimate.  There is a phantom "White Whamon", which is being pursued by Hookmon .
